articles.author: Jason Groves, Shaun Wooller
articles.title: Summer holidays at risk as ministers threaten to put Spain, France and Italy on a new danger list - Daily Mail
articles.description: Plans for an 'amber watch list' have sparked uproar in Whitehall, with some ministers warning the scheme could wreck the hopes of millions of Britons to go to holiday hotspots in Europe this summer.
articles.content:
Families were in a fight to save summer last night with holiday hotspots in Europe facing new travel rules.
Plans for an 'amber watch list' have sparked uproar in Whitehall, with some ministers warn… [+17867 chars]

articles.title: Ireland's vaccination rollout is 'great example' to the rest of Europe - Irish Mirror
articles.description: 71% of the population are now fully vaccinated against severe side effects of Covid-19 while 86% are partially covered
articles.content:
HSE Chief Paul Reid has said that Irelands vaccination rollout proves to be a great example to other European countries as walk-in centres get ready to open this weekend.

articles.title: Towards lighter plastic and carbon fiber rockets? - theinformant.co.nz
